text:
Nov 5
• Completed application for ANRF and had couple of sync with Pinaki on the same.
• Continued odoo testing and reported issues
• Had discussions with Visakh on the same and had a detailed discussion with Amjith, Visakh and Nihal on the demo.
• Testing of Care and followed up for Kerala Care release.
• Synced with Sona on the Kerala Care dashboard
• Call with Rohith on couple of Arike related matters
Next
• Sudheendra Visit
• Clean up project board along with Jeevan

07 Nov
• Disucssion with Vignesh, Amjith and Gigin regarding odoo
• Visited Sudheendra, demos and discussions with the team
Next
• Wrap the ANRF application
• Complete work on Kerala Care dashboards
• Project board clean up

Missed to post EOD for last few days
07 Nov
• Call with Jeevan on the leaderboard board
• Sync with Sona on updating the dashboards
• Quick call with Vignesh on the above and then updated all questions in Kerala Care dashboard to update the filter
• Sync with Pinaki and Sanjay on ANRF application
• PRs and issue cleanup
• Sync with Vinu on design roadmap and some issues
10 Nov
• Review calls
• Call with Kerala Care team on dashboard
• Syncs with Sona and created a facility dashboard
• Call with Ododd team to review progress and planned for a demo at SSMM
11 Nov
• Visited SSMM along with odoo team for demo and had discussions with hospital management on the same and discussed requirement for HR module
